animeDescription: Kageman is a boy who wants to become the best detective in the world. Each of the self-contained episode features a fun guessing game and unriddling of a case. (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Ohata, Kiyotaka', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Sadohara, Takeyuki', 'Episode Director'], ['Kume, Issei', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Makino, Takashi', 'Theme Song Composition']]
